title: "Joins. Работа со строками. Пакет stringr"

# cbind, rbind

```{r}
g <- rnorm(50)
dim(g) <- c(5, 10)
g <- as.data.frame(g)
g

f <- rnorm(30)
dim(f) <- c(3, 10)
f <- as.data.frame(f)
f


rbind(g, f)

h <- rnorm(21)
dim(h) <- c(3, 7)
h <- as.data.frame(h)
h

cbind(f, h)

# cbind.data.frame()
# rbind.data.frame()
```
